DIA_AraxosCityGuide_EXIT_03_01: And don't forget to visit our stall between the barracks and the Old Town!
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_HELLO_03_01: Hello! I don't think I've seen you here before. First time in our great Archolos?
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_HELLO_03_02: You don't have to answer, there's nothing to be ashamed of. There's always a first time, isn't there?
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_HELLO_03_04: My name is Kolg and I deal with all the lost in this great city. Is there perhaps a specific place you'd like to get to?
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_HELLO_03_05: Or maybe you will be interested in one of our maps?
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_TRADE_03_02: You won't get such accurate maps at such a low price in the whole city!
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_Place_15_01: There's a place I need to get to...
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_Place_03_02: In that case, talk to one of the Guides, they're all over town. For a small fee, they will take you wherever you need to go.
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_Place_03_03: Well, except maybe the slums, but who would want to visit them!
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_Place_Slums_03_02: Don't worry about it. It's just a Poor District. A place not worth visiting.
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_TellAbout_15_01: Can you tell me more about you?
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_TellAbout_03_02: We are a subordinate organization to the Merchant Guild of Araxos. We take care of the maps and organization, while they hire their runners as our guides.
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_TellAbout_03_03: A simple partnership that takes care of all newcomers.
DIA_AraxosCityGuide_City_03_02: First of all, have a good look around, the city is full of beautiful architecture and opportunities to make money!
DIA_Kolg_Ambient_03_01: Very good. How about a map? Prices are always a bargain!
DIA_Kolg_Ambient_03_02: All right. I hope you're getting as many orders as your heart desires! Business must be good.
DIA_Kolg_Ambient_03_03: Everything's all right, officer. I'm sure there would be a discount on the maps for the guard, so come on in!
